name: Handle With Air
description:
Note: Sometimes boxes wont give credit when dropped. If this happens pick it back up and drop it again. Also please play in fullscreen for a better experiance.

In this game your goal is to get enough boxes in the goal area. The more boxes in the area, the more the progress bar will fill up. Some boxes are worth more points than others. The level is complete when the progress bar is competely filled up.

Movement:          W, A, S, & D

Release Rope:     Space

Restart Level:      R

Creators:

Gavin C

Dom S
